meanings.definition: Relating to the emission of electrons from a material when exposed to light.
meanings.sent1: The photoelectrically charged material glowed brightly under the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The solar panel captured energy photoelectrically from the sun's rays.
meanings.sent3: The photoelectrically activated toy robot danced in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a photoelectrically charged light in the room.
meanings.sent5: The photoelectrically sensitive film captured every detail of the scene.

meanings.definition: In a manner that involves the conversion of light into electricity.
meanings.sent1: The solar panels functioned photoelectrically, powering the entire house.
meanings.sent2: The streetlights turned on photoelectrically as the sun set.
meanings.sent3: The garden lights twinkled photoelectrically as the dusk settled in.
meanings.sent4: Her phone charged photoelectrically using the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The flashlight operated photoelectrically, never needing batteries.
